effect_entries.effect: Held: Whenever the holder uses a move that requires a turn to charge first (Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Razor Wind, Skull Bash, Sky Attack, or Solarbeam), this item is consumed and the charge is skipped.  Skull Bash still provides a Defense boost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Both turns of a two-turn charge move happen at once. Consumed upon use.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせた　ポケモンは　１度だけ
１ターン目に　ちからを　ためる技を
すぐに　使うことが　できる。

A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon.
It allows the holder to immediately use a
move that normally requires a turn to charge.

Strumento monouso da dare a un Pokémon.
Permette l’uso immediato di una mossa che in
genere richiede un turno prima di essere eseguita.

Daña en cada turno al Pokémon que la lleva.
Puede adherirse al Pokémon que alcance con su
ataque al portador.

Ein Item zum einmaligen Tragen. Der Träger kann
dadurch eine Attacke sofort einsetzen, die sonst
aufgeladen werden muss.

Objet à tenir et à usage unique. Permet d’utiliser
immédiatement une capacité qui devrait se
charger au premier tour.

지니게 한 포켓몬은 한 번만
1턴째에 힘을 모으는 기술을
바로 사용할 수가 있다.

もたせた　ポケモンは　いちどだけ
１ターンめに　ちからを　ためるわざを
すぐに　つかうことが　できる。

A single-use item to be held by a
Pokémon. It allows the immediate use of
a move that charges on the first turn.

A single-use item to be held by a
Pokémon. It allows the immediate use of
a move that charges on the first turn.

d’utiliser immédiatement une capacité
qui devrait se charger au premier tour.
